audioJson.name: DAT
audioJson.fact1: This format could record at sampling rates equal to, higher, and lower than CD quality (44.1, 48, or 32 kHz)
audioJson.fact2: This format looks similar to a Compact Cassette but around half the size
audioJson.fact3: This format was lobbied against by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) in an attempt to prevent high-quality copies
